016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.server.api;
017
018import jakarta.inject.Inject;
019import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
020
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList;
023
024/**
025 * Collection of ServiceResourceObjects for this server. Each service should add their own ServiceResourceObject instances
026 * here on startup. This will get exposed by the API for the root of the JSON API so that clients can inspect what services are available.
027 */
028@Service
029public class ServiceResourceObjects {
030    private List<ServiceResourceObject> serviceResources = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<>();
031
032    @Inject
033    public ServiceResourceObjects() {
034    }
035
036    public void add(ServiceResourceObject serviceResourceObject) {
037        serviceResources.add(serviceResourceObject);
038    }
039
040    public List<ServiceResourceObject> getServiceResources() {
041        return serviceResources;
042    }
043}
